Package processingwrapper

Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • processingwrapper.Shape
      • processingwrapper.Ellipse
        • processingwrapper.Circle
  • public class Circle
extends Ellipse
    A circle that can be drawn in the screen. Like other Shape objects, an instance of Circle just contains information about its dimensions, not its position or color. Position and color are specified in the call to Canvas.draw(processingwrapper.Drawable, processingwrapper.Position); or an instance of Drawable can be created combining a circle with drawing settings.
